column2: b'@Doc_Steve_Brule @BarrsDorian @JulianKlymochko @fragbuckler In hindsight, I was wrong here. $mp.ws doubled since I sold it. I reread the prospectus and that 0.36x discount only applies in a certain situation: >90 days from merger + the company is trying to get rid of warrants but the common hasn\xe2\x80\x99t hit the $18 for 20 days trigger. I think.'

b'@spacanpanman @Mindwalletbody Long story short, I think I got the triggers wrong and so the discount in $mp.ws versus implied value was actually a great buying opportunity - there wasn\xe2\x80\x99t risk of the .36x discount feature kicking in. In hindsight, the market figured it out and $mp.ws doubled in 2 weeks.'
